event.title: Fellowship meeting in Vienna, Austria
event.body:
A Vienna Fellowship meeting will be in the Metalab, located in the Rathausstra√üe 6 in the 1st district of Vienna. We'll be there from 18:00. Special guest is the deputy fellowship coordinator Erik Albers from Berlin. Erik will talk about how to organize and perform FreeYourAndroid workshops.
As usual, this invitation is for everyone interested in the FSFE or Free Software. We're looking forward to seeing you there!
